segments.text: My gaze shifts to the center-left of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Two children are engaged in a mischievous act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing on a two-step stool in front of an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice it's tilting backward, very close to tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching upward, one hand already in a "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is clearly labeled and full of cookies, which is a happy sight for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he holds a plate, ready to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a daring move for such a young boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookies, he doesn't seem to notice the stool wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a very precarious situation for a few sweet rewards.
segments.speaker: PAR
